means: （想像别人苦乐情况）间接体验的

word_mean: 替代的，错位的：代替他位或他物作用的
发生于不正常情况下的。如异位月经(vicariousmenstruation)

sentence.Network_en: She invents fantasy lives for her own vicarious pleasure.
sentence.Network_cn: 她幻想过着各种奇妙的生活，从想入非非中获得乐趣。

sentence.Network_en: He got a vicarious thrill out of watching his son score the winning goal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看着儿子射入获胜的一球，也同样感到欣喜若狂。

sentence.Network_en: He gets vicarious thrills from watching people bungee jumping.
sentence.Network_cn: 看到别人蹦极他感到了同样的刺激.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... vicar 教区牧师 vicarious 替代的，代理的 vicinity 附近，接近.
vibrotherapy 振动疗法vicarious 感应式vicarious 替代的
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... vicarial 牧师的 vicarious 错位的 vicariously 代理地.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... precarious 危险的 vicarious 间接的，代理的 nefarious 违法的，邪恶的.

list.abs: 替代学习(Vicarious learning)理情行为治疗法(rational emotive behavior therapy) 自我管理方案价值澄清法当前国民小学学校辅导.
vicarious extinction 感应式学习消除vicarious function 替代作用vicarious learning 代替学习
2．替代经验(vicarious experience)：替代经验也是获取学习信心的主要途径之一。当看到朋友们通过不断努力获得成功而非依靠特殊 …
替代责任(Vicarious Liability) ，又称“代负责任”、“代理责任”。指一人依法对与其有特定联系的另一人之行为应无条件承担的间接责任。
ownership中文 ... share price 股票价格 ... vicarious liability 转承债务 virtual ownership 实际上的所有权.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin vicarius 'substitute' (see vicar) + -ous

entry.tran: 从他人经验中获得的;间接感受到的
entry.def: A vicarious pleasure or feeling is experienced by watching, listening to, or reading about other people doing something, rather than by doing it yourself.

example.ex: She invents fantasy lives for her own vicarious pleasure...
example.tran: 她幻想过着各种奇妙的生活，从想入非非中获得乐趣。

example.ex: Lots of people use television as their vicarious form of social life.
example.tran: 许多人从电视中间接感受社会生活。

sentences.sentence: "read about mountain climbing and felt vicarious excitement"

means.word_mean: 2. occurring in an abnormal part of the body instead of the usual site involved in that function;
3. suffered or done by one person as a substitute for another;

auth_sentence.content: Vicarious liability can be a real dilemma for franchisers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vicarious liability can be a real dilemma for franchisers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vicarious liability can be a real dilemma for franchisers.

auth_sentence.content: MR. VINES: One hotbed of litigation involves vicarious liability.
auth_sentence.res_content: MR. VINES: One hotbed of litigation involves vicarious liability.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MR. VINES: One hotbed of litigation involves vicarious liability.

auth_sentence.content: She wins the vicarious sweepstakes hands down.
auth_sentence.res_content: She wins the vicarious sweepstakes hands down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She wins the vicarious sweepstakes hands down.

means.word_mean: (想像别人苦乐情况)间接体验的,替代别人的

sentences.en: I love reading: I have an insatiable appetite for vicarious experience.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢读书，对于体验间接经历有一种不能满足的渴求。

sentences.en: He gets vicarious thrills from watching people bungee jumping.
sentences.cn: 看到别人蹦极他感到了同样的刺激。

sentences.en: He gained vicarious pleasure from watching people laughing and joking.
sentences.cn: 他看到人们谈笑， 自己也感到很高兴。
